channel.title: version-control on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in version-control on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Updating from CVS
item.author: vinod@kurup.com (Vinod Kurup, MD)
item.description: Here’s the steps I take in order to update my site from the latest OpenACS CVS. All of this info comes from Andrew Piskorski’s great CVS page or from pages listed in his document. Make sure that I’ve committed all the local changes that I’ve made. vinod:~$ cd web/kurup vinod:~/web/kurup$ cvs commit -m “Fixed foo, bar and blah” Go into the directory containing my OpenACS CVS checkout and grab the latest sources.
